channel.title: Entra ID on David Just
channel.description: Recent content in Entra ID on David Just

item.title: Introducing the M365 Report Tools PowerShell Module
item.description: The Why I often find the need to gather and extract data from various areas M365 for auditing or for project planning. I had the idea of putting together a PowerShell module containing wrapper functions for some of the most common reports I and colleagues ask for. I wanted to make the commands easy to discover and easy to use. I would like to introduce the M365.Report.Tools PowerShell module! What can it do?
